present_plan:
Present your implementation plan to the user for approval.
WHEN TO USE: - After gathering sufficient context in plan mode - When you have a clear understanding of what needs to be done - When ready to propose specific changes
PLAN FORMAT (markdown): ```markdown # Implementation Plan: [Brief Title]
## Objective [1-2 sentence summary of what will be accomplished]
## Files to Modify - `path/to/file1.py` - [brief change description] - `path/to/file2.py` - [brief change description]
## Approach 1. [First step with rationale] 2. [Second step with rationale] 3. [Continue as needed]
## Considerations - [Risk or edge case to handle] - [Dependencies or prerequisites]
## Acceptance Criteria - [ ] [Specific, verifiable outcome] - [ ] [Another verifiable outcome] ```
AFTER CALLING: - If approved: Plan saved to PLAN.md, plan mode exits, you can use write tools - If denied: Revise based on feedback and call present_plan again
DO NOT call this tool until you have: 1. Read relevant files to understand current implementation 2. Identified all files that need modification 3. Formed a clear step-by-step approach
